attributes.action: All politicians should not have private interests in healthcare companies that can be used to privatise the NHS
attributes.additional_details:
There are currently about 50 MPs that have an active interest in the privatisation of the NHS . These MPs would gain financially if the firms / companies they have an active / passive role in get contracts in the NHS .
No politicians should have any interest or role in private health care companies / connections that they can influence with their power .
